Class CoffeeBrewer

java.lang.Object
  Product
      CoffeeBrewer

public class CoffeeBrewer
extends Product

This class models a coffee brewer. It extends Product and adds the following information:

  1. the model of the coffee brewer, a String
  2. the water supply ("Pour-over" or "Automatic")
  3. the capacity expressed in number of cups, a int

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Product

Constructs a CoffeeBrewer object.

Parameters:
initialCode - the code of the product.
initialDescription - a short description of the product.
initialPrice - the price of the product.
initialModel - the model of the coffee brewer.
initialWaterSupply - the water supply is ("Pour-over" or "Automatic").
initialNumberOfCups - the capacity expressed in number of cups.
